io.ataraxic.nomicflux.wuwei

Class STRef<S,A>

  • Object
    • STRef<S,A>
  • Type Parameters:
    S - The hidden state parameter used to unify a sequence of ST events and prevent them from leaking references
    A - The type of the value being mutated

    public final class STRef<S,A>
extends Object
    A class to work with mutable references within the ST monad

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  STRef.STRefCreator<S,A>
      Used to create an STRef within an ST monad.

    • Method Detail

      • stRefCreator

        public static <A> STRef.STRefCreator<?,A> stRefCreator()
        Used to create STRefs of the given type A. Hides the internal state type parameter S.
        Type Parameters:
        A - Type of the value to be held in the STRef
        Returns:
        An STRef.STRefCreator which will do the work of unifying the state type parameters

      • readSTRef

        public ST<S,A> readSTRef()
        Read a value from an STRef. Necessary to freeze the computation at a point in time in order to ST.runST() and retrieve the value.
        Returns:
        The value of the STRef within the ST monad

      • writeSTRef

        public ST<S,STRef<S,A>> writeSTRef(A a)
        Write a value to a STRef.
        Parameters:
        a - New value to be held in the reference
        Returns:
        This STRef after the new value has been written

      • modifySTRef

        public ST<S,STRef<S,A>> modifySTRef(Fn1<A,A> fn)
        Modify a value within a STRef.
        Parameters:
        fn - Function to apply to the value in the reference.
        Returns:
        This STRef after the old value has been modified in place.
